metadata.title: Blacklist Extension Installation
metadata.description: Extensions installation must be blacklisted by default.

metadata.title: Block Desktop Notifications
metadata.description: Sites ability for showing desktop notifications must be disabled.

metadata.title: Check Certificate Revocation
metadata.description: Online revocation checks must be done.

metadata.title: Block Plugin Execution By Default
metadata.description: Default behavior must block webpages from automatically running plugins.

metadata.title: Enable Default Search Provider
metadata.description: Default search provider must be enabled.

metadata.title: Set Default Search Provider Name
metadata.description: The default search providers name must be set.

metadata.title: Disable 3D Graphics APIs
metadata.description: 3D Graphics APIs must be disabled.

metadata.title: Disable Autocomplete For Forms
metadata.description: AutoFill must be disabled.

metadata.title: Disable Automatic Plugin Search And Installation
metadata.description: Automated installation of missing plugins must be disabled.

criterion.comment: Chromium disable automatic plugin search and installation

metadata.title: Disable Background Processing
metadata.description: Background processing must be disabled.

metadata.title: Disable Cleartext Passwords
metadata.description: Cleartext passwords in the Password Manager must be disabled.

metadata.title: Disable Cloud Print Sharing
metadata.description: Cloud print sharing must be disabled.

metadata.title: Disable Firewall Traversal
metadata.description: Firewall traversal from remote host must be disabled.

metadata.title: Disable Google Data Synchronization
metadata.description: Google Data Synchronization must be disabled.

metadata.title: Disable Incognito Mode
metadata.description: Incognito mode must be disabled.

metadata.title: Disable Metrics Reporting
metadata.description: Metrics reporting to Google must be disabled.

metadata.title: Disable Network Prediction
metadata.description: Network prediction must be disabled.

metadata.title: Disable Outdated Plugins
metadata.description: The running of outdated plugins must be disabled.

metadata.title: Disable Password Manager
metadata.description: The Password Manager must be disabled.

metadata.title: Blacklist Plugins
metadata.description: Plugins must be disabled by default.

metadata.title: Disable Pop-ups
metadata.description: Sites ability to show pop-ups must be disabled.

metadata.title: Disable Javascript URL Protocol Schemas
metadata.description: The URL protocol schema javascript must be disabled.

metadata.title: Disable Importing Saved Passwords
metadata.description: Importing of saved passwords must be disabled.

metadata.title: Disable Search Suggestopms
metadata.description: Search suggestions must be disabled.

metadata.title: Disable Per Session Cookies
metadata.description: Session only based cookies must be disabled.

metadata.title: Disable Third Party Cookies
metadata.description: Third party cookies must be blocked.

metadata.title: Disallow Location Tracking
metadata.description: Site tracking users location must be disabled.

metadata.title: Enable Approved Plugins
metadata.description: Plugins approved for use must be enabled.

metadata.title: Enable Browser History
metadata.description: Browser history must be saved.

metadata.title: Enable Encrypted Searching
metadata.description: The default search provider URL must be set to perform encrypted searches.

metadata.title: Enable Safe Browsing
metadata.description: Safe Browsing must be enabled.

metadata.title: Extension Whitelist
metadata.description: Extensions that are approved for use must be whitelisted.

metadata.title: HTTP Authentication
metadata.description: The HTTP Authentication must be set to negotiate.

metadata.title: Plugins Require Authentication
metadata.description: Plugins requiring authorization must ask for user permission.

metadata.title: Chromium Policy File Exists
metadata.description: The Chromium policy file must exist and be configured correctly.

metadata.title: Set Trusted Homepage URL
metadata.description: The homepage must be set to a trusted site.

metadata.title: Configure Whitelisted Plugins For Use
metadata.description: URLs must be whitelisted for plugin use.

metadata.title: Installed operating system is part of the Unix family
metadata.description: The operating system installed on the system is part of the Unix OS family

criterion.comment: Installed operating system is part of the unix family

metadata.title: Google Chromium Browser
metadata.description: The application installed on the system is the Google Chromium Browser

extend_definition.comment: Installed OS is part of the Unix family

ind:textfilecontent54_test.comment: Chromium disable automatic plugin search and installation

ind:family_test.comment: Test installed OS is part of the unix family
